page.title: 08HEALTH
page.content: We have a{surgery}in Lapford at our village hall .The doctors come to it on two mornings a week between 9 and 11.30 a.m and people go to see them there .The nearest full-time {Health {Centre}is at Chulmleigh ,seven miles away and there are four {doctors}who work from there .We have a District Nurse who visits people in their homes ,a {Health visitor}who does the same , and a Nurse who comes regularly to school to test our sight and hearing .If we have to go to {hospital}we go to Exeter , seventeen miles away .That is also the nearest {accident {department.}That is where operations are carried out and where our mothers go to have their babies.
